sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p:
SEPTIZON, or Septizonium, in Roman antiquity, a celebrated mauſoleum, built by Septimus Severus, in the tenth region of the city of Rome : it was ſo
called from ſeptem and zona, by reaſon it conſiſted of ſeven ſtories, each of which was ſurrounded by a row of columns.
